pkgmetadata.longdescription: Extended HOF (Huisman-Olff-Fresco) Models // Extended and enhanced hierarchical logistic regression models (called Huisman-Olff-Fresco in biology, see Huisman eta l. 1993 JVS) models. Response curves along one-dimensional gradients including no response, monotone, plateau, unimodal and bimodal models.
